title: MEMORY Aroma Dough Aromatherapy Putty
description: Squeeze your stress with essential oil infused Aroma Dough with our citrus squeeze MEMORY. Fidget fun while squeezing while studying essential oils or Orange and Lemon Balm. No Artificial "Scents" - We're the Real Stuff! Aaaah! keep a tub at your office with our "Squeeze, Knead and Breathe technology which releases the therapeutic essential oils specially formulated to instill a sense of happiness in a Squeeze! So convenient, put one in your purse, laptop case, perfect for car or the anxious traveler. Even helps strengthen hand muscles and nourish mind muscles too! Wherever you go take Aroma Dough it's the only Aromatherapy Dough you'll "knead"
